epics.title: User Authentication
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication for secure user login
epics.description: Develop a secure user authentication mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication (MFA). Ensure that bank customers can log in securely using a combination of password and a secondary authentication method such as SMS, email, or an authenticator app.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for customers
epics.description: Design and implement a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on the customer's profile and eligibility. The dashboard should provide easy navigation and quick access to key features.

epics.title: Secure Financial Data
epics.summary: Implement comprehensive security measures for sensitive financial data
epics.description: Ensure that all sensitive financial data is protected with robust security measures. Implement encryption, secure data storage, and secure transmission protocols to maintain the confidentiality and integrity of customer information.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop the self-service banking portal with a responsive design that provides a consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure that all features are accessible and functional on any device.

epics.title: Account Opening Requests
epics.summary: Enable submission of account opening requests
epics.description: Develop the functionality for customers to submit account opening requests through the portal. Implement streamlined workflows that require minimal clicks and collect all necessary information and documentation securely.

epics.title: Service Modifications
epics.description: Allow customers to request modifications to their existing banking services through streamlined workflows. Ensure that the process is simple, efficient, and secure.

epics.title: Real-time Status Updates
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and email notifications
epics.description: Implement a system that provides customers with real-time status updates and email notifications regarding their submitted requests. Ensure that customers are kept informed throughout the process.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of customer interactions
epics.description: Develop a feature to maintain a comprehensive history of all customer interactions with the portal. Ensure that customers can easily view their transaction history and previous requests securely.

epics.title: Save and Resume Applications
epics.summary: Allow customers to save and resume incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement functionality that allows customers to save incomplete applications and return to them later. Ensure that the saved data is secure and can be retrieved easily when the customer is ready to complete the application.

epics.title: Document Upload
epics.description: Allow customers to upload necessary documentation directly through the portal interface. Ensure that the document upload process is user-friendly and secure.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Integrate with the bank's existing core banking system
epics.description: Develop seamless integration with the bank's existing core banking system. Ensure data synchronization and real-time communication between the portal and the core banking system.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Implement role-based access controls to ensure that customers can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. Ensure that access controls are strictly enforced to maintain data security and privacy.
